plot: Heather is someone who avoids the world, communicating primarily via electronics. When she gets a friend request from a stranger, she blindly accepts it... only to discover that he is more dangerous than she can possibly imagine.
title: Friend Request
plot_es: Heather is someone who avoids the world, communicating primarily via electronics. When she gets a friend request from a stranger, she blindly accepts it... only to discover that he is more dangerous than she can possibly imagine.
plot_en: Heather is someone who avoids the world, communicating primarily via electronics. When she gets a friend request from a stranger, she blindly accepts it... only to discover that he is more dangerous than she can possibly imagine.
